vote.text: Amendment SA 4122 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4122 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Johnson SD. (consideration: CR S6926; text: CR S6926) To provide an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4122 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Johnson SD.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4122 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
